JobFullDesc: Azure Serverless Container Infrastructure team is looking for an experienced leader to define the product strategy of the platform that powers Azure Container Instances.  As a part of the Azure Serverless Container Infrastructure team, you will be responsible for imagining, designing, and building the next generation of our platform to run serverless containers and hyper-scale stateful micro-services. As a part of your role, you will work with both internal & external customers, and engineering team and other operational partners to create prioritized feature roadmap. You will lead a cross functional team to execute on this roadmap, and report progress during business and operational reviews.
